mapper.insert: insert into tibetdb.order(order_num, order_name, order_tel, order_phone, order_email, receiver_name, receiver_zip, receiver_addr1, receiver_addr2, receiver_tel, receiver_phone, receiver_msg, order_state, order_pay, product_num, product_name, product_thumbnail, product_price, product_sale, product_color, product_size, product_count, user_id) values (#{order_num}, #{order_name}, #{order_tel}, #{order_phone}, #{order_email}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_zip}, #{receiver_addr1}, #{receiver_addr2}, #{receiver_tel}, #{receiver_phone}, #{receiver_msg}, #{order_state}, #{order_pay}, #{product_num}, #{product_name}, #{product_thumbnail}, #{product_price}, #{product_sale}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_count}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * from tibetdb.order WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and (order_date between #{dateFrom} AND #{dateTo});
SELECT * FROM tibetdb.order WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and (order_state LIKE '%교환%' or order_state LIKE '%취소%' or order_state LIKE '%반품%');
SELECT * from tibetdb.order WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and (order_date >= #{dateFrom} AND order_date <= #{dateTo}) and (order_state LIKE '%교환%' or order_state LIKE '%취소%' or order_state LIKE '%반품%');
